We've updated the resume queue on your homescreen with a few GoogleCast playback improvements in addition to other bug fixes to enhance your experience.

We are also retiring iOS 10 support in this version. What does that mean? It means that if you are running iOS 10 on your device, this is the last update you will be able to make on your OS. The app will continue to function as it does, but you will not be able to see new features until you update your OS.

As always, drop us a note at support@masterclass.com if you have any questions or feedback.

* Introducing MasterClass Labs (for subscribers): a new area where you can try out new features in development, starting with Skills. Hone your skills across multiple topics with tips from various MasterClass instructors!

* We request Bluetooth Permission to enable seamless Casting device experience
